title: News Article
description: Schema for GPU Agent news articles

content.description: Markdown content of the article. Write in a natural, conversational tone. Avoid overly enthusiastic language (thrilled, delighted, excited), excessive superlatives (incredible, amazing, revolutionary), corporate jargon (leverage, synergy), and formulaic phrases (it's important to note, it's worth mentioning). Be direct, factual, and specific.
